name: SLUGDOUGH
description:
Cut SLUGDOUGH to the right length to fit them into the hole! 

SLUGDOUGH was developed over a six week period by Harvey Hayman during the National Film and Television School 'App Factory' module. 

  • Developed by Harvey Hayman 
  • Music by Nir Perlman 
  • Text animator by Febucci

Click the download link to download and play on Android!
